stories.Title: Europe wants its own Starlink
stories.Description: A 2.4 billion euro investment will support the construction of Europe's own global communication constellation, with major satellite companies, including SES and Eutelsat.
stories.Tweet: Europe wants its own Starlink 📦 A 2.4 billion euro investment will support the construction of Europe's own global communication constellation, with major satellite companies, including SES and Eutelsat. #europe https://arstechnica.com/science/2023/05/europes-major-satellite-players-line-up-to-build-starlink-competitor/

stories.Title: Try out Microsoft's Bing latest tools
stories.Description: Users can now access the new visual search and image-based answers features on Microsoft's AI-powered search engine without a waitlist.
stories.Tweet: Try out Microsoft's Bing latest tools 📦 Users can now access the new visual search and image-based answers features on Microsoft's AI-powered search engine without a waitlist. #microsoft https://www.businessinsider.com/microsoft-bing-ai-features-introducing-new-search-with-images-2023-5

stories.Title: Alfa Romeo has its sights set on Tesla
stories.Description: The Italian luxury automaker is planning to dethrone Tesla in North America by shifting its focus to an all-electric lineup and releasing its first electric car next year.
stories.Tweet: Alfa Romeo has its sights set on Tesla 📦 The Italian luxury automaker is planning to dethrone Tesla in North America by shifting its focus to an all-electric lineup and releasing its first electric car next year. #alfaromeo https://electrek.co/2023/05/03/alfa-romeo-introducing-larger-electric-suv-to-the-us/

stories.Title: Salesforce brings AI to Slack
stories.Description: SlackGPT, an AI-powered chatbot for the workplace messaging app, is now available, providing features such as message summaries and note-taking on calls.
stories.Tweet: Salesforce brings AI to Slack 📦 SlackGPT, an AI-powered chatbot for the workplace messaging app, is now available, providing features such as message summaries and note-taking on calls. #ai https://www.cnbc.com/2023/05/04/slack-gpt-ai-chatbot-can-take-notes-summarize-messages-and-more.html

stories.Title: StarCoder: The alternative to Copilot
stories.Description: Hugging Face and ServiceNow have joined forces to develop a royalty-free alternative to code-generating AI systems. Trained in more than 80 programming languages.
stories.Tweet: StarCoder: The alternative to Copilot 📦 Hugging Face and ServiceNow have joined forces to develop a royalty-free alternative to code-generating AI systems. Trained in more than 80 programming languages. #ai https://techcrunch.com/2023/05/04/hugging-face-and-servicenow-release-a-free-code-generating-model/

stories.Title: Google's AI-powered privacy tool
stories.Description: The company’s long-awaited product, Checks, is now available for mobile developers, allowing them to ensure their apps meet the latest privacy standards easily.
stories.Tweet: Google's AI-powered privacy tool 📦 The company’s long-awaited product, Checks, is now available for mobile developers, allowing them to ensure their apps meet the latest privacy standards easily. #ai https://techcrunch.com/2023/05/03/checks-the-ai-powered-data-protection-project-incubated-in-area-120-officially-exits-to-google/

stories.Title: Databricks latest move
stories.Description: With the goal of accelerating AI-powered functionality in its own data governance solution called Unity Catalog, the company has decided to acquire the platform Okera.
stories.Tweet: Databricks latest move 📦 With the goal of accelerating AI-powered functionality in its own data governance solution called Unity Catalog, the company has decided to acquire the platform Okera. #ai https://venturebeat.com/ai/databricks-acquires-okera-to-boost-its-ai-driven-data-governance-platform/

stories.Title: Is AI a threat to the music industry?
stories.Description: Professionals warn artists to stay one step ahead of machines due to concerns over copyrights, and transparency issues caused by AI's sudden rise.
stories.Tweet: Is AI a threat to the music industry? 📦 Professionals warn artists to stay one step ahead of machines due to concerns over copyrights, and transparency issues caused by AI's sudden rise. #ai https://variety.com/2023/music/news/ai-vs-music-industry-fake-drake-eminem-who-gets-paid-1235601494/

stories.Title: The Earth's eventual fate
stories.Description: Scientists witnessed a planet get devoured by a dying star, and their observation reveals something about our own solar system's unavoidable fate.
stories.Tweet: The Earth's eventual fate 📦 Scientists witnessed a planet get devoured by a dying star, and their observation reveals something about our own solar system's unavoidable fate. #science https://www.washingtonpost.com/climate-environment/2023/05/03/dying-star-eats-planet-study/

stories.Title: Chrome's padlock icon gets redesigned
stories.Description: Google announces plans to replace the website security padlock icon in Chrome with a "tune" icon, after realizing people misunderstand its purpose.
stories.Tweet: Chrome's padlock icon gets redesigned 📦 Google announces plans to replace the website security padlock icon in Chrome with a "tune" icon, after realizing people misunderstand its purpose. #chrome https://www.theverge.com/2023/5/3/23709498/google-chrome-lock-icon-web-browser-https-security-update-redesign

stories.Title: Verification comes to Gmail
stories.Description: A blue checkmark will be added to the sender's name in Google's Gmail to protect users from scammers.
stories.Tweet: Verification comes to Gmail 📦 A blue checkmark will be added to the sender's name in Google's Gmail to protect users from scammers. #gmail https://www.theverge.com/2023/5/3/23709734/gmail-verified-checkmark-trusted-senders-bimi-dmarc
